Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Graciously \Gra"cious*ly\, adv. 1. In a gracious manner; courteously; benignantly. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
2. Fortunately; luckily. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
graciously adv : in a gracious or graceful manner; "he did not have a chance to grow up graciously" [syn: {gracefully}] [ant: {ungraciously}, {ungraciously}]
